CustomField.description: STOP: Please DO NOT check this checkbox if you do not understand the impact of it. Purpose of this flag to use during data migration when user don't want backend processes like Triggers, Process Builder, Validation Rule etc to RUN. Only disables, 1. Triggers: which inherits "NV_TriggerHandler" class 2. Any other processes: If they have used this flag in criteria.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
STOP: Please DO NOT check this checkbox if you do not understand the impact of it.
It Disables, 1. Triggers: which inherits "NV_TriggerHandler" class 2. Any other processes: If they have used this flag in criteria.
CustomField.label: Disable Trigger Actions
